msbt.message: Step right up! Step right up to Redd's Raffle!

Oh! Why, I don't believe you and I have had the pleasure.The name's Redd. I work in sales. And you are<10_4 /> !What a great name! Intelligent. Strong. I can already tell we're gonna be pals. No, not palsfamily! It's a pleasure to meet ya, !Wow! I almost forgot to mention my little attraction here.It's a limited-timeand limited-liability business I'm hosting, so you gotta act fast!Exclusively during fireworks shows, I'm offering YOU the chance to win big. I call itRedd's Raffle!

Either I'm seeing things or it's none other than my favorite cousin! How are ya, ?Actually, we'll skip the chitchat. I'm sure you're much more interested in my little attraction here.It's a limited-timeand limited-liability business I'm hosting, so you gotta act fast!Exclusively during fireworks shows, I'm offering YOU the chance to win big. I call itRedd's Raffle!

Either I'm seeing things or it's none other than my new favorite cousin! How are ya, ?Hmm Weren't you gonna buy some art from me? Let's put a pin in that and cut a deal another day.I'm sure you're much more interested in my little attraction here, anyway!It's a limited-timeand limited-liability business I'm hosting, so you gotta act fast!Exclusively during fireworks shows, I'm offering YOU the chance to win big. I call itRedd's Raffle!
You're excited, I can tell!
It's only a ticket, and each ticket nets a prize. That's right. Every ticket is a winner! So, whaddaya say?
I'm in!
No, thanks.
Sounds too good to be true, huh? Well, I assure you it IS true. You won't wanna miss out on this!

Now that's what I like toâ€” Haaang on a minute! You don't have .Sorry, but even though you're like family, if I bend the rules for you, I'd have to bend them for everyone else.It's a ticket. No discounts. My margins are too thin as it is
Hold on! Your pockets are full. Like I said, EVERY ticket's a winner. You gotta have room for your prize!
Excellent! Wonderful! Now, if you please, reach your hand into the box and pull yourself a ticket!
What'll it be? What'll you win? Let's find out!<10_7 arg="90" />
Big number 1!<100_3 arg="3" /> And just like that, you've won yourself a red sparkler! Congratulations!
Very nice! It's number 2!<100_3 arg="3" /> Here you go, your very own blue sparkler! Congratulations!
One of my favorites, it's number 3!<100_3 arg="3" /> You won yourself a fountain firework! Congratulations!
Big score! It's number 4!<100_3 arg="3" /> I've got a bubble blower with your name on it! Congratulations!
A nice, round number 5!<100_3 arg="3" /> That'll win you a brand-new uchiwa fan! Congratulations!
Is that a 9?No, wait, that's a 6!<100_3 arg="3" /> You won a pinwheel! Congratulations!
It's lucky number 7!<100_3 arg="3" /> Here's a tweeter for the big winner! Congratulations!
We have a number 8!<100_3 arg="3" /> You've won a blue balloon! Congratulations!
It's nuuuuuuuuuumber 9!<100_3 arg="3" /> Enjoy your red balloon! Congratulations!
You pulled the number 10!<100_3 arg="3" /> You've won your very own yellow balloon! Congratulations!
Heeeeeere's the number 11!<100_3 arg="3" /> And here's a green balloon for the lucky winner! Congratulations!
There it is! The number 12!<100_3 arg="3" /> You're the proud owner of a pink balloon! Congratulations!
Ah! Too bad. Come back and play again soon, alright?
You're a natural at this! Why don't you pull another? Only !
Yeah, let's go!
Nah, I'm good.
You're on a roll. Care to keep it going for another ?
Yeah, let's go!
Nah, I'm good.
Way to pull that ticket! How'd you like to pull another for ?
Yeah, let's go!
Nah, I'm good.
Welcome! Welcome! You're two steps away from Redd's Raffle! Fabulous prizes! Every ticket's a winner!
Welcome! Welcome! You're two steps away from Redd's Raffle! Fabulous prizes! Every ticket's a winner!
Sorry, Redd's Raffle's not ready yet. I'm still setting up. It'll be open as soon as the fireworks start!

Sorry, I'm not open just yet. Oh! Why, I don't believe you and I have had the pleasure.The name's Redd. I work in sales. And you are<10_4 /> !What a great name! Intelligent. Strong. I can already tell we're gonna be pals. No, not palsfamily! It's a pleasure to meet ya, !Wow! I almost forgot to mention the little attraction I'm settin' up here.It's a limited-timeand limited-liability business I'll be hosting, so you'll have to act fast!Exclusively during fireworks shows, I'll be offering YOU the chance to win big. I call itRedd's Raffle!I hope you'll come back when it's ready and take a look. See ya then!

Sorry, I'm not open yet.<10_4 /> Oh! Why, it's none other than my favorite cousin! How are ya, ?Actually, we'll skip the chitchat. I'm sure you're much more interested in the attraction I'm setting up here.It's a limited-timeand limited-liability business I'll be hosting, so you'll have to act fast!Exclusively during fireworks shows, I'll be offering YOU the chance to win big. I call itRedd's Raffle!I hope you'll come back when it's ready and take a look. See ya then!

Sorry, I'm not open yet.<10_4 /> Oh! Why, if it isn't my new favorite cousin! How are ya, ?Hmm Weren't you gonna buy some art from me? Let's put a pin in that and cut a deal another day.I'm sure you're much more interested in the attraction I'm setting up here, anyway. That's only natural!It's a limited-timeand limited-liability business I'll be hosting, so you'll have to act fast!Exclusively during fireworks shows, I'll be offering YOU the chance to win big. I call itRedd's Raffle!I hope you'll come back when it's ready and take a look. See ya then!
Sorry, we're closed. But don't worry, Redd's Raffle will be back next week. I'll see you then!
Sorry, Redd's Raffle is closed till next year's fireworks shows. I hope you got as much out of it as I did!

Sorry, but Redd's Raffle is closed.<10_4 /> Oh! Why, I don't believe you and I have had the pleasure.The name's Redd. I work in sales. And you are<10_4 /> !What a great name! Intelligent. Strong. I can already tell we're gonna be pals. No, not palsfamily! It's a pleasure to meet ya, !It's too bad you missed out on my little attraction here. Everyone was having fun at very reasonable prices.But don't worry, I know we'll see each other again. I can't wait to do business with ya!

Sorry, Redd's Raffle is closed.<10_4 /> Oh! Why, it's my very favorite cousin! How are ya, ?Actually, I don't have the time to chitchat right now. I gotta pack up this little attraction of mine.Y'know, it's too bad you didn't come by earlier. Everyone was having fun at extremely reasonable prices.But don't worry, there will be plenty of other opportunities for us to cut a deal. You can count on it!

Sorry, Redd's Raffle is closed.<10_4 /> Oh! Why, it's my new favorite cousin! How are ya, ?Hmm Weren't you gonna buy some art from me? Let's put a pin in that and cut a deal another day.Right now I gotta finish packing up this little attraction of mine.Y'know, it's too bad you didn't come by earlier. Everyone was having fun at some extremely reasonable prices.But don't worry, there will be plenty of other opportunities for us to cut a deal. You can count on it!
